preConditions.sqlCheck: select case when ('ibdbv2_algodao_merged' = DATABASE()) then 1 else 0 end from dual;
SELECT COUNT(*) > 0 FROM cvterm WHERE cv_id=1020 AND cvterm_id=20001 AND `name`="";

changeSet.comment: Set blank method name of 20001 to 'Estimativa'.
changeSet.sql: REPLACE INTO `cvterm`(`cvterm_id`,`cv_id`,`name`,`definition`) VALUES (20001,1020,'Estimativa','Estimativa'); UPDATE cvterm SET definition = REPLACE(definition,"BY IN","::") WHERE cv_id=1040 AND definition LIKE '%BY IN%';

changeSet.author: vanina
changeSet.comment: Create stockId backup table and migrate inventory_id values for more than 1 stock_id
changeSet.sql:
CREATE TABLE stock_id_bkp ( ims_lot INT(11) NOT NULL, ims_transaction INT(11) NOT NULL, stock_id VARCHAR(35) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (ims_lot, ims_transaction, stock_id));
INSERT INTO stock_id_bkp SELECT t.lotid, t.trnid, t.inventory_id FROM ims_transaction t WHERE t.inventory_id IS NOT NULL;

changeSet.author: vanina
changeSet.comment: Add column stock_id to ims_lot table

changeSet.author: vanina
changeSet.comment: Update column stock_id with the lower stock_id
changeSet.sql: UPDATE ims_lot AS lot INNER JOIN (SELECT trx.lotid, inventory_id, MIN(trnid) FROM ims_transaction trx WHERE trx.inventory_id IS NOT NULL GROUP BY trx.lotid) AS t ON t.lotid = lot.lotid SET lot.stock_id = t.inventory_id;

changeSet.author: vanina
changeSet.comment: Drop role column inventory_id from ims_transaction table
